title: Stargate.SG1.Lost.City.Extended.Cut.S07E21.DVDRIP.Bapman
description:
This is the 1st made for TV movie of Stargate SG-1, LOST CITY. This was aired as the 2 parter Season 7 finale. 

This is the EXTENDED CUT of that. It has five minutes EXTRA all on the Epic Finale. 
It incorporates the Extended scenes from Season 9 premierre plus some more. 
Some minor alterations were made to have the scenes fit in a fast paced but cohesive form. 

YES... it is FAN MADE. I never uploaded my FAN EDITS &#039;cause I didn&#039;t think anyone would be interested but since my friends loved it and kept bugging me, here it is. 

For those who HAVE seen it... you can give it a try or not. BUT for those who have NOT, I would recommend watching this one &#039;cause these scenes were not put in the original one &#039;cause of production costs. 

QUALITY: - DVDRIP FULL RES 

VIDEO - 720 x 576 [16:9 Codec Aspect Ratio] 
CODEC - XVID 
FRAME - 30 FPS 
AUDIO - 160 KBps LAME MP3 

LENGTH - 1:24:32 [1 Hour 24 Minutes 32 Seconds] 

P.S. - If you would like me to upload the other Fan Edits... just let me know on the comment section. 
All comments are appreciated. 

Enjoy. :-)
